dict.acceptation: 考虑；把（某人，某事）看作…，认为（某人，某事）如何；考虑，细想；

sent.orig: When you read, don't just consider what author thinks, consider what you think.
sent.trans: 当你读书的时候，不要只考虑作者是怎么想的，更要考虑你自己是怎么想的。

sent.orig: Now, when you read, don't just consider what the author thinks. Consider what you think.
sent.trans: 同样，读书的时候，不要只想作者怎么看，想想你怎么看。

sent.orig: Must consider the currency the fluctuation, must consider from this brings the confidence loses the question.
sent.trans: 要考虑到货币的波动，也要考虑到由此带来的信心丧失问题。

sent.orig: Now, when you read, don't just consider what the author thinks consider what you think.
sent.trans: 当你阅读时别只想到作者的见解，想想你的见解。

sent.orig: And so some things that you would never consider otherwise, make sense to consider.
sent.trans: 所以一些你不然不会想到的一些事情，现在想想就有道理了。
